title: Did Giuliani Correctly Tweet That Wuhan Lab Got $3.7M from US in 2017?
subtitle: Giuliani tacitly echoed President Donald Trump's assertion that the COVID-19 coronavirus came from a lab in Wuhan.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Rudy Giuliani correctly tweeted that a research lab in Wuhan, China, got a $3.7 million grant from the U.S. in 2017 despite a ban on such funding.
